name: Save the slime (WIP Title)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys: move/jump/drop through floor
  • F: Interact/Continune dialogue
  • E: Open Inventory
  • Mouse: Menu interactions

Description:

You are a scientist working on your slime monster creation when an earthquake takes down the power. The life support of your creation is no longer working and hence the slime slowly dying. 

Fix the power generators in the buildings and find a way to safe your slime. Feed it random office furniture, plants and food to delay its demise and buy you more time to find the generators.

Extra:

This is a demo made for the "Extra Credits" - Game Jam 2020 (Theme "Take Care"). 

There is nothing new to do after the first generator  has been activated..
